ğŸ“ Solution

This challenge follows the same format at the previous one but this time the passowrd needs to have a length of 11, â€œAâ€ as the first character and â€œXâ€ as the fourth and eight character. Giving â€œAXXXXXXXXXXâ€ three times gives the flag but the keygen can also be used.

Have a great day :) github.com/johnnnathan

ğŸ”‘ Keygen (Python)

import random
import string

def create_random_string():
    s = ['A'] + [random.choice(string.ascii_letters + string.digits) for _ in range(10)]  
    s[3] = 'X'  
    s[7] = 'X'
    return ''.join(s)

result = create_random_string()
print(result)
